Игра прикольная есть и для одиночек сюжет и для 2-х друзей.  Ну вот сюжет был не много легким как по мне, но есть карты из мастерской которые делают люди и они делают реально сложные карты. Так что удачи сломать себе мозг

I wish to play this with a friend, as I have only been going through the solo story! I'm sure it would be more fun with lots of shenanigans playing with a good buddy. Even so, it is still a great experience, the challenging puzzles will always leave you thinking hard. The game is very creative and dynamic, it's awesome to see what Valve has achieved with the Portal series.

Hands down best puzzle game ever made.  Granted, Im not a huge puzzle dude but this game had fun enough machanics.  However, the reason i love the game so much is the story and its presentation.  It isn't the best story ever made, but it blew me away for this sort of game.  9.5/10

Always gonna be a great game. Challenging puzzles, witty humor and slightly unerving enviornments make this game top tier.
Não achei que fosse conseguir jogar, por conta do meu PC ser muito ruim, mas pra minha surpresa, o jogo roda incrivelmente bem. Pra quem gosta de jogo que te faz quebrar a cabeça, recomendo bastante.

Un juego de puzzles muy bueno. Su historia esta bien, con un humor único, personajes carismáticos y un buen mensaje. Tanto como de 1 persona como en el co-op los puzzles estan casi siempre bien hechos y muy intuitivos, no son ni muy difíciles ni fáciles, solo me perdí como 3 veces en un juego de 20 horas. Encima tiene un creador de salas para entretenerse horas creando y probando mapas y una buena rejugabilidad al tener diálogos secretos y el desafío de romper los monitores. Totalmente recomendable
Amazing game definitley worth whatever you pay for it.

This game is AMAZING! The puzzles are genius and fun to play, the story is also great but i recommend playing the first Portal game before this one.
